about.title: About Iranian Pediatric Lung Scientific Association
about.subtitle: Specialized Center for Research and Education on Pediatric Lung Diseases
about.description: The Iranian Pediatric Lung Scientific Association aims to advance knowledge and awareness in the field of pediatric lung diseases, organizing conferences, seminars, and training workshops, and providing consulting services to physicians and families.
about.missionSubtitle: We are committed to improving children's respiratory health
about.missionDescription: Best diagnostic and therapeutic services using latest medical technologies
about.visionDescription: Becoming a leading reference in children's respiratory health
about.activitiesLead: Over two decades of experience in education and research
about.activitiesDescription: Collaboration with prominent specialists in organizing congresses, workshops and consultations
about.activity2: Training Workshops for Physicians and Nurses
about.expertiseSubtitle: Skills and expertise of association members in children's respiratory health
about.expertiseHeading: Expertise of the Iranian Pediatric Lung Scientific Association
about.expertiseDescription: The association, in collaboration with prominent specialists and experienced researchers, is active in various fields of pediatric lung diseases.

contact.faqSubtitle: Answers to common questions about the association
contact.faq1Question: How can I become a member of the association?
contact.faq1Answer: To become a member of the Iranian Pediatric Lung Scientific Association, you can submit your request through the contact form or contact the association's headquarters. Membership requirements include having a medical or related degree and interest in working in the field of pediatric lung diseases.
contact.faq2Question: Does the association provide medical consultation services?
contact.faq2Answer: Yes, the Iranian Pediatric Lung Scientific Association provides consultation services to families and physicians. These consultations include guidance on diagnosis, treatment, and care of children with lung diseases.
contact.faq3Question: How can I participate in conferences and workshops?
contact.faq3Answer: To participate in the association's conferences and training workshops, you can learn about upcoming programs through the events and announcements section and register at the scheduled time. You can also subscribe to the association's newsletter to stay informed about the latest news and events.
contact.faq4Question: Does the association hold training courses?
contact.faq4Answer: Yes, the Iranian Pediatric Lung Scientific Association regularly holds training courses and specialized workshops for physicians, nurses, and medical students. These courses cover various topics on pediatric lung diseases and the latest diagnostic and treatment methods.
